### Description
Hello Besu Hyperledger community,
We hope this message finds you well. We have successfully implemented a public testnet using Besu Hyperledger, and we are now eager to transition to building a mainnet for our project. As we embark on this journey, we have some questions and would greatly appreciate your guidance.

**Building Besu Hyperledger Mainnet:**
Could you provide a step-by-step guide or documentation on how to build a blockchain mainnet using Besu Hyperledger?
Are there any best practices or considerations we should keep in mind during the mainnet deployment process?
